Howdy, I'm Stephen!

I am a recent [MEDS](https://bren.ucsb.edu/masters-programs/master-environmental-data-science) graduate in search of problems to solve.

I'm interested in all things data science, agroecology, and conservation. When I'm not crunching numbers, you can find me in the garden composting, the kitchen simmering, or the cellar fermenting.


## Education

**Master of Environmental Data Science (MEDS)**, Bren School of Environmental Science & Management, University of California, Santa Barbara (2025)

**Certificate, Microscopy & Soil Science** - Soil Food Web School (2022)

**B.A. Anthropology** - University of California, Santa Cruz (2014)

## Skills

**Machine Learning & Data Analysis:**
Python(NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Time Series, Machine Learning, Decision Trees, Parameter Tuning), R(tidyverse), SQL(SQLite, PostgreSQL), Git/GitHub, ArcGIS

**Data Visualization:**
Python(Matplotlib, Seaborn), R(ggplot2, tmap, shiny

**Computer:**
Microsoft & Google suites, QuickBooks, Canva, Mailchimp, Power BI, Tableau
